statements: SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights_biases;
SELECT layer_name, bias_vector FROM neural_network_weights_biases;
SELECT layer_name, weight_matrix FROM neural_network_weights_biases ORDER BY layer_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT layer_name FROM neural_network_weights_biases;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights_biases WHERE layer_name = 'hidden_layer';
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights_biases ORDER BY layer_name DESC, bias_vector ASC
SELECT layer_name, SUM(weight_matrix[1]) AS total_weight FROM neural_network_weights_biases GROUP BY layer_name
SELECT layer_name, bias_vector[2] FROM neural_network_weights_biases WHERE bias_vector[1] > 0
SELECT DISTINCT layer_name FROM neural_network_weights_biases
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights_biases WHERE layer_name = 'hidden_layer'
SELECT * FROM weights_and_biases;
SELECT layer_id, weight FROM weights_and_biases;
SELECT bias, weight FROM weights_and_biases WHERE layer_id = 1;
SELECT layer_name, activation_function FROM model_layers;
SELECT * FROM model_layers WHERE activation_function = 'ReLU';
SELECT * FROM weights_and_biases
SELECT layer_id, weight FROM weights_and_biases WHERE bias > 0
SELECT layer_id, weight, bias FROM weights_and_biases WHERE bias < 0.1 ORDER BY weight DESC
SELECT * FROM model_layers WHERE activation_function = 'ReLU'
SELECT layer_name, activation_function FROM model_layers ORDER BY layer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights;
SELECT layer_name, weight_matrix FROM neural_network_weights WHERE layer_name='conv1';
SELECT * FROM neural_network_biases ORDER BY layer_name DESC;
SELECT layer_name, bias_vector FROM neural_network_biases WHERE layer_name='fc1';
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM neural_network_parameters WHERE parameter_value > 0.5;
SELECT layer_name, weight_matrix FROM neural_network_weights WHERE layer_name = 'hidden_layer';
SELECT * FROM neural_network_biases WHERE layer_name = 'output_layer';
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM neural_network_parameters WHERE parameter_value > 0.5 ORDER BY parameter_name DESC;
SELECT layer_name, weight_matrix FROM neural_network_weights WHERE layer_name = 'input_layer' OR layer_name = 'output_layer';
SELECT * FROM neural_network_biases ORDER BY layer_name ASC, bias_vector DESC;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights WHERE layer_id = 1;
SELECT weight, bias FROM neural_network_weights WHERE node_id = 10;
SELECT input_data, target_data FROM training_data ORDER BY example_id DESC;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM model_parameters WHERE parameter_value > 0.5;
SELECT iteration_id, AVG(loss_value) as avg_loss FROM loss_history GROUP BY iteration_id;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights WHERE layer_id = 1 ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT node_id, weight FROM neural_network_weights WHERE bias > 0;
SELECT example_id, input_data, target_data FROM training_data WHERE example_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM loss_history ORDER BY iteration_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM model_parameters WHERE parameter_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Layers;
SELECT network_name FROM NeuralNetworks WHERE network_id = 1;
SELECT layer_id, weight FROM Weights ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT activation_function FROM Layers WHERE layer_id = 2;
SELECT update_id, layer_id, new_weight, new_bias FROM Updates WHERE update_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM Biases WHERE bias < 0.5 ORDER BY bias DESC;
SELECT network_name, layer_id, activation_function FROM Layers INNER JOIN NeuralNetworks ON Layers.layer_id = NeuralNetworks.network_id WHERE network_name = 'NeuralNet_1';
SELECT layer_id, new_weight FROM Updates WHERE new_weight > 0.2 AND new_bias < 0.1 ORDER BY new_weight ASC, new_bias DESC;
SELECT layer_id, SUM(weight) AS total_weight FROM Weights GROUP BY layer_id HAVING total_weight > 100;
SELECT layer_id, AVG(bias) AS average_bias FROM Biases GROUP BY layer_id HAVING COUNT(layer_id) > 1 ORDER BY average_bias DESC;
